item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

What’ s wrong with your current compiler, what errors are you getting? It shouldn’ t be very challenging to write your own depending on the packaging (although clients aren’ t usually packaged).

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

  1. Open combiler
    Copy this code and replace with old.

@echo off @TITLE Combiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo Please instanl java. (java.com) :end echo Done. pause exit
Test it
It should work.
If not msn me

zack16austin@live.com

Read full topic
